name: Col Teal
description:
Temp. Rating: -30 / 15 °C
The Col is an insulated yet lightweight head cover that keeps heat from escaping. The large, chip-resistant faceplate features a cutting-edge GX coating to ensure the purest light quality for viewing the surrounding environs.
description_cn:
适用温度：-30 / 15 °C
"山口"是一款轻质的隔热头罩,可以防止热量外泄. 大尺寸，抗碎屑的面罩应用了尖端的GX涂层，可确保使用者观察周围环境时能获得最纯净的视野.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli
